column11: * Measurements represent the START of each phase.

column12: atrial contraction tops off ventricular filling
ventricles begin to contract with all valves closed
semilunar valves open; blood is rapidly ejected
ventricles relax with all valves closed
AV valves open; blood rapidly fills ventricles
ventricular filling slows as pressures equalize
atrial contraction tops off ventricular filling

column4: used for base volumes of chambers
"Atrial contraction also referred to as the "atrial kick," contributes the remaining 20–30 percent of ventricular filling"
